Constructor Detail

UserInterface

public UserInterface(java.util.List<java.lang.String> activatedCommands,
                     boolean debug)
The Constructor trys to instantiate a Object for every given Command Name. If the instantiation is succesfull the command Name and the matching Object is saved in the commands HashMap.

Parameters:
activatedCommands - Command Name List
debug - if debug is set to True a stackTrace is printed if anything goes wrong, otherwise the relating cmd is not loaded
Method Detail

run

public void run()
Main Loop The Mainloop waits for new Commands. The First Word of the typed Line is interpreted as Command.

Specified by:
run in interface java.lang.Runnable

getObjectForCmd

private IUIAction getObjectForCmd(java.lang.String cmd)
Search for a given Command prints an Error Message if the given Command could not be found

Parameters:
cmd -

printToConsole

public void printToConsole(java.lang.String text)
Sends text to Console without newline! BUT! A Newline is printed at the Start of the Loop.

Parameters:
text -

printCommandList

private void printCommandList()
prints a List of all loaded Commands

stop

public void stop()
The Stop Method schedules the STOP-Event. After the next Command the Mainloop ends.
